content: <style=SizeBig>Astonishing!</style>... Stay calm. {A害羞挠头}Moo, didn't expect you to beat me to it.

content: {A看我的}HMM! Moo-velous. I'll wear this outfit to watch the meteor shower with you. Much obliged for the invitation. I'll be there at the drop of a hat!

content: {A想象}Mmmooo? I was just thinking about what I should wear to the gathering... Do you have a moment to help me decide?

content: When I saw the meteor shower, I thought of inviting you to watch it together, so I'm putting on my best hat to make the invitation official. Lucky us, our thoughts bashed heads at just the right time!

content: {A看我的}So you're happy with my outfit now? Moo problem then! Much obliged for the invite. I'll show up at the drop of a hat!
